BIRDBOT / PAPERTRON





Papertron: Well, I'm a stinky chameleon. Erf fer f=
er fer! Trespassing? I don't know what that is but I've been trying to get =
those peoples attention. I want to live there.



(Birdbot looks at Sarge a=
nd stands up straight.)



Birdbot: RY! All I want is what everyone else is=
 eating! RY! Nothing is wrong with me accept I hate people when they don't =
leave me alone! And I hate whiney crying people and laughing people. I want=
 to join this guys too but they keep ignoring us. Do you know one of their =
names so I can call them out here?....

rge: What are you?

  He looks at Birdbot.

  Sarge: And what's wrong with =
you?...
